entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text: @JGreenblattADL @ScottAdamsSays At this point, Wuhan Virus helps identify where the outbreak occurred. This is important as it’s not local. If China banned travel from US it would make no sense. But it makes all the sense in the world for US to limit travel FROM Wuhan. You’re in the wrong fight.
